Package io.rhythmknights.coreframework.component.api.plugin

Class RegisteredPlugin

java.lang.Object
io.rhythmknights.coreframework.component.api.plugin.RegisteredPlugin
public class RegisteredPlugin extends Object
Represents a plugin registered with CoreFramework
